  In the depths of the long=
 forgotten caves, in the dank and dark of the

  A long, brown, spindly leg emerges from a coccoon.  Then another, and
 =
 another, and another, until all eight are freed from thier bonds.  
  The =
large golden optics emit a soft glow as they look about the tomb

e imprisoned in.

et vengence on

shall have

  The femme bot transforms int=
o bot mode.  The noticable violin shape
  still on her back.  Her legs fold=
ed up to give her a fan tail look. 
  Her glossy chocolate brown and tan co=
lors melt into the blackness of
  her cave.  She walked about, looking for =
the way out. But the entrance
  had caved in so long ago. She let her hand =
glide over a boulder and
  she sighed. "Hmm, well, it will take more than t=
his to stop me."  She
  flicked her wrist and shot a small web at the bould=
er.  With an evil
  grin, she spat some of her corrosive venom onto the web=
 and took a few
  steps back.  The venom started to disolve the web. The we=
b flashed
  red, then with a medium sized explosion, the rocks soon tumbled=
 out of
  the way.  Reclusa walked out of the cave in bot mode.  Using her =
comm
  beacon, she turned it on. She would need other bots in order to exac=
t
  her revenge on the Maximals who killed her ancestor Arachnia.

come to me, said the spider to the fly."
